remarks: Under subset ordering, the intersection of a class abstraction is less than or equal to any of its members.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2005.)
statement:
intmin3.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
intmin3.3 $e |- ps $.
intmin3 $p |- ( A e. V -> |^| { x | ph } C_ A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ps x $.
